entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 5:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -20.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -22.9°C
Wind: ENE 30 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
